posts.post_content:
I'm looking to trade for a lower grade Red Cobb, graded or ungraded. Any back that won't add a huge premium. I have the cards below to trade. They are also for sale individually if you're interested. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url]
